text: Great job! i really like how devday gives me inspiration to try new things, gives me motivation to call clients so they can implement new features and best of all, i really like the community and how we support each other!

I also like the thoughtful aspect of having a sign interpreter. Though i have thought that the the window might be a little small to actually see her signing properly, but i also don´t know sign language at all so i could be totally wrong with that observation.
if an expert HubSpot Dev like you is saying something like that, it says something about the quality of the speakers and the topics!
What swag I saw no swag
I had to miss one of the sessions due to a meeting can i re watch these anywhere?

:wave: <@U0177RKAS1H> We will be sharing recordings of the sessions in the coming days over various channels. If you registered for the event you'll get an email when that content is available :slightly_smiling_face:
Is it just me or, this whole devday was smelling like if HubSpot would launch "Developer Hub" in April 2022 ?
